description: Fixed the chords in the intro/verse arpeggio and other minor tweaks
title: The Day That Never Comes

description: Guess what? I another thing went unnoticed. I left James' guitar without palm muting right after the solo. Now I think everything is right. If it isn't I'm gonna go crazy.
title: The Day That Never Comes

description: - Fixed some minor things that went unnoticed yesterday. I hope my revision is right!
title: The Day That Never Comes

description:
- Changed how the verse riff is played (same sound) 
- Added the octave on the "solo" after the 1st chorus
- Tempo changes to make it more consistent (specially in the end of the song, where it would suddenly jump 20 BPM)
- Changed how the pre-solo power chord riff is played (same sound)
- The last solo's tremolo picking intro is now two semitones up, because that's where it should be
- Minor changes on some power chords in the ending of the song
- Corrected the snare roll at the very ending
title: The Day That Never Comes

description: Changed to Jazz Chorus Tone to make it sound more like the guitar hero version
title: The Day That Never Comes

description:
-Re added the octave power chords
-Fixed some other notes on the solo
title: The Day That Never Comes

description:
-Fixed the ending tale of the intro
-Got rid of the octave of the intro solo
-Placed the correct fret in the main solo
title: The Day That Never Comes

description:
Completely redid the 5-string Bass track (not a 4 string) per isolated bass track: http://youtu.be/4uXvMpJW6_U

This includes all screw-ups, slides, hammer on/pull-offs, tapping (m.214), etc that Rob employed.

Updated tempos so it is now (mostly) on time with the actual studio track.

The dotted quarter rest at m.21 has been filled in with a “12” on A.

I've updated Kirk's solo m.221-222 (slowed down isolated guitar tracks to pin down each note).

There were some occasional time signature errors that were fixed, especially around m.119-121, which had an added 3 eighth notes that are not in the actual song (also, fixed the end of this arpeggio as it is F-G-G#, not F#-G-G#).

Changed the 9/16 measures at the end to 6/8. 

Fixed the outro rhythm on all guitars/bass.

Added a silent 4 string bass track. Rob barely used notes below the E string (m.198, 202, 244, 246). Just those few notes are transposed up an octave.

Fixed some note spellings.
title: The Day That Never Comes

description: Rolled back to previous (other tracks didn't export)
title: The Day That Never Comes

description: Removed vocals for a sync error, but I will fix it soon.
title: The Day That Never Comes
